channel.title: writing on Dr Daft
channel.description: Recent content in writing on Dr Daft

item.title: Why should knowledge management matter?
item.description: I had already planned on making the first few posts of my blog about how I eventually set up the whole thing. This was partly because I would have something to quickly write about while it was still fresh in my mind, but also so I could stick to a habit of writing. I don’t really have a schedule in mind for how often I intend to post here (yet), but I’m hoping that with these first few technical posts I can get in the swing of it better.
